channel.title: Server Status % goes down when my server is online
channel.description:
[b]I have done this serveral times on different days, so it's not just a one off:[/b]
I have been playing on my Server for a few hours now, and people were coming and going for a while but then I noticed that people stopped coming on and there were only a few people left. I thought this was weird because it had only restarted a couple of times to reduce lagg. I checked the Server Status page and couldn't find my server, so I manually typed it in. When it loaded it showed that my server's uptime was 67% which was [b]highly frustrating[/b] because I know full well it only went off a few times for a split second when it restarted.
I was wondering if there was anyway of making my server stay at 100% on the server status list because otherwise I have to wait for it to drop below 40% and then re-submit it. This means there are hardly any people on my server because no one knows it even exists :/.
It could potentially be a 24/7 server but after a short while it goes below 80%, and no one searches for servers past the second page so I would have no chance of anyone coming on my server, so I would be wasting my time leaving it on 24/7.
Any help please? :(

item.title: Server Status % goes down when my server is online
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try to clear your internet cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Status % goes down when my server is online

item.title: Server Status % goes down when my server is online
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

maybe someone in your house doesnt know this cmd runs your server and accidently exits it out
\

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status % goes down when my server is online
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

No, there isn’t. Don’t restart the server. Buy a VPS if it is really making you that annoyed.

Read full topic
